theory_assignments.subcluster_name: FOXO Regulation of Stem Cell Maintenance and Oxidative DNA Damage
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on FOXO3's role in protecting hematopoietic stem cells from oxidative DNA damage and maintaining stem cell function.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: FOXO Regulation of Stem Cell Maintenance and Oxidative DNA Damage
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes FOXO factors regulating hematopoietic stem cell quiescence, oxidative stress resistance, and aging-like phenotypes.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: FOXO Regulation of Stem Cell Maintenance and Oxidative DNA Damage
theory_assignments.reasoning: Emphasizes FOXO's role in stem cell self-renewal and longevity, especially in Hydra and humans.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: FOXO Regulation of Stem Cell Maintenance and Oxidative DNA Damage
theory_assignments.reasoning: Highlights FOXO3's regulation of stem cell homeostasis, cellular integrity, and longevity.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: FOXO Regulation of Stem Cell Maintenance and Oxidative DNA Damage
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on FOXO3's conserved role in stem cell maintenance and longevity across species.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: FOXO Regulation of Stem Cell Maintenance and Oxidative DNA Damage
theory_assignments.reasoning: Proposes FOXO as a master regulator of aging via stem cell proliferation and immune function.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: FOXO Regulation of Stem Cell Maintenance and Oxidative DNA Damage
theory_assignments.reasoning: Details FOXO's critical role in stem cell self-renewal and innate immunity in Hydra linked to aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: FOXO Regulation of Stem Cell Maintenance and Oxidative DNA Damage
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes FOXO's control of microbiome resilience via antimicrobial peptides, linking tissue maintenance and aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: FOXO Regulation of Oxidative Stress Resistance and Nutrient Signaling
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on FOXO-mediated oxidative stress resistance regulated by insulin/IGF-1 signaling and calorie restriction.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: FOXO Regulation of Oxidative Stress Resistance and Nutrient Signaling
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes FOXO's role in oxidative stress resistance and skeletal homeostasis integrating stress signals.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: FOXO Regulation of Oxidative Stress Resistance and Nutrient Signaling
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on FoxO6 phosphorylation regulating oxidative stress and its modulation by calorie restriction.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: FOXO Regulation of Oxidative Stress Resistance and Nutrient Signaling
theory_assignments.reasoning: Details FOXO transcription factors as lifespan regulators modulated by insulin/IGF signaling and ROS.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: FOXO Regulation of Oxidative Stress Resistance and Nutrient Signaling
theory_assignments.reasoning: Covers FOXO as conserved lifespan regulators integrating insulin/IGF signaling and stress resistance.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: FOXO Regulation of Oxidative Stress Resistance and Nutrient Signaling
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes FOXO as central regulators in dietary restriction longevity signaling via insulin/IGF-1 and AMPK.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: FOXO Regulation of Epigenetic Nutritional Programming and Lifespan
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on FOXO inhibition by high sugar diets causing epigenetic changes that program lifespan.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: FOXO Regulation of Epigenetic Nutritional Programming and Lifespan
theory_assignments.reasoning: Emphasizes MYST family histone acetyltransferase complex regulating FOXO transcription epigenetically.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: FOXO Regulation of Epigenetic Nutritional Programming and Lifespan
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on FOXO regulation by multiple post-translational modifications integrating aging-related signaling.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: FOXO Regulation of Epigenetic Nutritional Programming and Lifespan
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes FOXO regulation by AKT and 14-3-3 proteins affecting localization and activity.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: FOXO Regulation of Epigenetic Nutritional Programming and Lifespan
theory_assignments.reasoning: Details FoxO1 regulation of proteasome subunit expression linking insulin/IGF signaling to proteostasis and longevity.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: FOXO Regulation of Epigenetic Nutritional Programming and Lifespan
theory_assignments.reasoning: Discusses FOXO family functional redundancy and evolutionary diversification affecting regulation and aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: FOXO Regulation of Genomic Stability and DNA Repair
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on FOXO3 and other isoforms maintaining genomic stability via DNA repair and redox balance.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: FOXO Functional Coupling and Evolutionary Diversification Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Proposes aging arises from evolutionary coupling and functional congestion of FOXO pathways limiting lifespan.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: FOXO Functional Coupling and Evolutionary Diversification Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes antagonistic interactions between FoxO and FoxM1 balancing cell cycle and stress response affecting aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: FOXO Functional Coupling and Evolutionary Diversification Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on FoxO1 regulation of fat catabolism linking nutrient sensing to longevity pathways.
